title: Jailbreak Twitch or Super Galaxy Twitch
body:
Recently I saw the Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 trailer and it made me want to see a new science fiction skin for twitch, who I am currently learning and want to main. I think the theme could look very good for twitch, imagine him shooting laser beams! He would look so sweet! I was thinking that either Super Galaxy or Jailbreak would look great! Jailbreak would fit closest to Rocket Raccoon, but Super Galaxy could look awesome as well!

http://imgur.com/r/reactiongifs/wYheWDU

replies.body: we need more neon strikes, thats where my vote goes

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=sY3tM6st,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-06T04:19:40.834+0000)
>
> we need more neon strikes, thats where my vote goes

That is honestly a great idea! Better than the ones I had!

http://imgur.com/35icgoF
Anything where his auto attacks aren't green gets my vote.
